description:
godoc: really restore toy selection to playground widget

playground.js include is removed in revision 1676e21191aa which fixes issue
4225, rendering toy selection nonfunctional.

messages.text:
LGTM. Tested in Firefox.

+adg.

I wonder why CL 6640054 remove the inclusion of playground.js?
a special case just for golang.org?

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

NOT LGTM

This is intended behavior. The playground.js file is now included by
lib/godoc/godoc.html, but only if the playground is enabled.  This works
fine if you run godoc with -play.

subject: code review 6976049: godoc: really restore toy selection to playground widget
